name: Urban
storyline:
"Urban" is a Neo-noir Story set in a part of town, 
terrorized by a radically idealistic group. 
 
Fight against opponents with varying moves and strengths. 
Experience a Story with thought-provoking Characters told through Manga panels. 
Test you reactions with different difficulties. 
 
Game play 
- turn based first-person Fighting 
- which requires fast reactions to block attacks from multiple directions 
- striking back from multiple directions , with varying strength and chances of being blocked 
- use helpful items to give yourself some advantages , if you are struggling. 
 
Story 
-The story revolves around a group of charachters , each one of them with a different view of 
their world. 
-You'll accompany these characters in a struggle against a radically idealistic group. 
 
Visual Style 
- black and white with elements of neo-noir 
- told through Manga panels
summary: "Urban" is a Neo-noir Story told through Manga panels, with unique first-person fighting mechanics.
